title: Manasula Soora Kaathey Lyrics Cuckoo Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Manasula Soora Kaathey
Singer(s): RR, Divya Ramani
Lyricist: Yuga Bharathi
Music: Santhosh Narayanan
Movie: Cuckoo (2014)

Manasula Soora Kaathey 
adukkudhu kadhal poothe (2)
Nilave sorootudhe, kanave thaalaattudhe
minnal osayum kadhlille ketkkudhe
undhan vaasanai vaanavil kaattudhe.

Vaa vendurm sollum munne
varuginra niyabagam.
Kanne un sollil kanden
ariyaadha thaai mugam.

ahh...ragasiya yosanai kodukkudhe rodhanai
sollaadha aasai ennai suda suda kaaichudhe
pollaadha nenjil vandhu pudhu oli paaichudhe
kannile illaye kaadhalum
nenjame kaadhalin thaayagam.

Aanandham pennai vandhe azhagaaga pesudhe
minsaara railum vanna kuyil pola pesudhe.
kai thodum podhile kalangavum thonudhe
anbe un anbil veesum, karuvarai vaasame
eppodhum ennil veesa midhandhidum baavame
moongile raagamaai maarudhe
moochile vaanoli paadudhe.

Manasula Soora Kaathey 
adukkudhu kadhal poothe (2)
Nilave sorootudhe, kanave thaalaattudhe
minnal osayum kadhlille ketkkudhe
undhan vaasanai vaanavil kaattudhe.

seo.description: Get the complete Manasula Soora Kaathey Lyrics Cuckoo Song Lyrics from Cuckoo. Read the lyrics penned by Yugabharathi and composed by Santhosh Narayanan and sung by Divya Ramani. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Yugabharathi, Cuckoo, Santhosh Narayanan, Divya Ramani, RR, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
